p: The concentration of total carotenoids revealed a great variation among the cultivars (0.21 ± 0.03 to 2.31 ± 0.10 µg·mL −1) ( Figure 5). The literature reports a synergistic effect of carotenoids of great importance for the biological properties of plant extracts, which is linked to the production of different classes of compounds such as phenylpropanoids, terpenes, and alkaloids [ 89].
